import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Form } from 'reactstrap'; import { Button, ButtonGroup, FormGroup, InputGroup, HTMLTable, NumericInput } from '@blueprintjs/core'; import ProjectOptions from '../Selects/ProjectOptions'; import EmployeesOptions from '../Selects/EmployeesOptions'; export default class KPIForm extends Component { render() { const { onChange, onSubmit, buttonCaption, onClear, name, //String time_from, //Date time_to, //date target, // number project, //ProjectOPt manager //ManagerOPT } = this.props; return (
); } } KPIForm.defaultProps = { addButtonCaption: 'Add' };
